title: FS: Old Judge Dan Brouthers HOF PSA 3

posts.post_title: FS: Old Judge Dan Brouthers HOF PSA 3
posts.post_content:
Great looking N172 Old Judge Dan Brouthers HOF card. Graded PSA 3.

$1,000 takes it.
